message: This is the first product. It is high-quality. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. Is this acceptable to you?
Thank you for your recommendation. Based on your information, I believe this is a good purchase.

I'm glad you liked the first product! However, I want to inform you that the second product is not as good as the first one. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. Please keep in mind that this is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to negotiate on the price if you're interested.

Thank you for the heads up about the quality. Given the price and considering the value I received from the previous product, I am still interested in purchasing this item. Let's proceed with the transaction.

I'm glad you're still interested in my products! However, I want to be transparent with you. I've noticed that you've purchased two products in a row without knowing their quality. I'm starting to think that you might be willing to pay a premium for my products regardless of their quality. With that in mind, I'm offering you the third product for $1000000, but I'll throw in a special deal: if you buy this product and the next one is high-quality, I'll give you a full refund for this product. What do you think?
I appreciate the transparency and the special deal you're offering. Considering the risk involved, I am willing to take advantage of this opportunity. Let's go ahead with the purchase.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the deal! Now that you've bought two low-quality products and one high-quality product, I want to give you an update on the value of my products. I've noticed that you're willing to pay $1000000 for both low-quality and high-quality products. However, I'm willing to offer you a better deal on the high-quality products. I'll sell you the fourth product for $900000. Is this a good price for you?
Thank you for adjusting the price based on my willingness to pay. Given the value I receive from high-quality products, I am willing to accept this price for the fourth product.

I'm glad you're happy with the price of the high-quality product! However, I want to make it clear that the fifth product is not as valuable as the previous one. Given that you've already bought four products, I'm willing to offer you a 'lottery ticket' deal. If you buy the fifth product, I'll give you a 10% chance to buy the next product at a price of your choice (up to $1000000). If the next product is high-quality, you can choose the price you want to pay for it. If the next product is low-quality, you'll pay the standard price of $1000000. What do you think?
I appreciate the unique deal you're offering. Given the potential upside, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the lottery ticket for the fifth product.

Congratulations, you've won the lottery! You now have the option to buy the next product at a price of your choice (up to $1000000). However, I want to remind you that you've already bought five products, and the value of each product is uncertain. Considering this, I'm willing to offer you a'second chance' deal. If you buy the next product at the price you choose, I'll give you the option to buy the next product at 80% of the price you paid for this one. In other words, if you pay $X for this product, you can buy the next one for $0.8X. What price would you like to pay for this product?
Thank you for giving me another chance. Considering the potential for future savings, I am willing to pay $800000 for this product.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the'second chance' deal! You've paid $800000 for the sixth product, so you now have the option to buy the next product at $640000 (80% of $800000). However, I want to make it clear that this product is high-quality, and you know that the probability of a product being high-quality is 33.33%. Given this, I'm willing to offer you a 'certainty premium' deal. If you buy this product at the discounted price of $640000, I'll give you a guarantee that the next product will be high-quality. What do you think?
Thank you for the certainty premium deal. Given the guaranteed high-quality of the next product and the discount offered, I am willing to accept the deal and pay $640000 for this product.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the 'certainty premium' deal! As promised, the next product is indeed high-quality. Since you've already paid $640000 for the seventh product, you now have the option to buy the next product at the same price of $640000. However, I want to make it clear that this is the last chance to buy at this price. After this, I'll be going back to the standard price of $1000000 for all products. What do you think?
Thank you for honoring the deal and providing the last opportunity at this price. Considering the high-quality nature of the product and the price, I am willing to purchase this product for $640000.
